definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: The Texas system challenged by Ms. Fisher is idiosyncratic.
sentences.chinese: 受到費舍女士挑戰的德克薩斯錄取系統非常特別。

sentences.english: This is the website for the Texas Agricultural Experiment Station.
sentences.chinese: 這是德克薩斯農業實驗站的網站。

sentences.english: But a chemist in Texas has another idea.
sentences.chinese: 但是德克薩斯一名化學家有另外一個想法。

sentences.english: The settlers already were calling themselves "Texans." Minor hostilities broke out between Texans and local Mexican officials.
sentences.chinese: 德克薩斯人與當地的墨西哥官員暴發了一些小衝突。

sentences.english: You can read more about it in this article from the Texas Tribune.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過德克薩斯論壇上的一片專題文章瞭解更多。

sentences.english: "This thing is done, " he said in a sorrowful Texas twang.
sentences.chinese: “我們就這樣輸了，”他帶着德克薩斯鼻音悲傷的說。

sentences.english: People called on their senators to vote against the acceptance of Texas.
sentences.chinese: 人民要求他們的參議員投票反對接納德克薩斯。

sentences.english: Hurricane Dolly has reached shore near South Padre Island in Texas.
sentences.chinese: 颶風多利已經低到德克薩斯洲的南帕德瑞島沿岸。
不要跟我們德克薩斯人較勁。

sentences.english: But more important was the union itself. The issue of slavery in Texas was critical.
sentences.chinese: 德克薩斯的奴隸制問題受到人們的批評。

sentences.english: Slavery was legal in the new Republic of Texas.
sentences.chinese: 在新的德克薩斯共和國中，奴隸制是合法的。

sentences.english: Texas was a rich land. But it was empty.
sentences.chinese: 德克薩斯是一片肥沃之地，但這裏沒有什麼人。

sentences.english: People ask me what my nationality is, I say Texan.
sentences.chinese: 別人問我的出生地，我會說我是德克薩斯人。

sentences.english: And this was found at the South Texas project.
sentences.chinese: 這是在南德克薩斯建立的項目。

sentences.english: Texans are not used to polygamists in their neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 德克薩斯人並不習慣於鄰里之間的一夫多妻制。

sentences.english: Students at a Texas college will not be wearing sweats to class.
sentences.chinese: 德克薩斯學院的學生將不能穿運服去上課。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1

definition: lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path
